properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kwa kinywa changu
nitaziimba sifa zako
ulimi wangu utanena
siku zote.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh Lord and my savior,
I will sing for you. x2
Mwili wangu utaja
na furaha mbele zako,
moyo wangu utatoa
shukurani kwako Baba.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Mikono yangu napeperusha
juu hewani
nashangilia napigapiga
hata makofi.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Miguu yangu narusharusha
pande zote
naenda mbio nifike
kule uliko nitubu.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Kwa macho yangu
nitakuona Mungu wangu
kwa mawazo yangu
nitakuwaza daima.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Kwa masikio yangu
nitakusikiliza
uniitapo nitakuitika
milele yote.
